text:
Power supply will be suspended in the following areas on Thursday:

10 a.m. to 4 p.m.: Kanuvapet, Lourdu Nagar, Periyapet, S.S. Nagar, Odiyampet Road and surrounding areas.

9.30 a.m. to 5.30 p.m.: Nehru Nagar, MGR Nagar, Siva Vishnu Nagar, Ramanar Nagar, Jayam Nagar, Jayamoorthy Raja Nagar Extension, Kumaran Nagar, Iyyanar Koil Street, Cholan Nagar and Anitha Nagar.
title: Power shutdown
